extendedInfo.description: GAITAME TRADE.COM is the trading platform you can use anywhere with your Android smart phone.You can manipulate below items by just tapping:â¢ Trade same FX and CFD instruments as on the PC trading platformâ¢ Able to choose 5 types of order: at market, limit, stop, OCO, P&Câ¢ View real-time pricing, current open position and working ordersâ¢ View real-time updating chart, and customize indicatorsGAITAME TRADE.COMâs other functionalities are:â¢ Create price alarm â¢ Set your favourite instruments on the trading platformâ¢ View High, Low, Open and Close rateâ¢ View account detail including equity and Floating P/LDownload GAITAME TRADE.COM is free.Open the account on Planex Trade.comâs website if you have not got your own account yet.Recommended:Android 2.1  and upCompany informationPLANEX TRADE.COM Co., Ltd.Registration Number: Director-General of the Kanto Local Financial Bureaus (Financial Futures) No. 2512General incorporated association, Financial Futures Association of Japan, No. 1532Commodity Futures Association of Japan
